channel.title: Gotocph on Trisha Gee

item.title: GOTO Copenhagen
item.description: So,  before everything gets pushed out of my head, GOTO Copenhagen. It was my first conference "alone", in that I didn't have friends and colleagues from LMAX or the London Java Community there with me.  And certainly at the start of the conference, I wasn't the only one who was standing around, hoping someone would talk to me (in all honesty some of the photos above are a little unfair - the schedule was a very nice, simple phone app so most people spent a lot of time playing with their phones).
